Class DateTimeArgs

java.lang.Object
  com.googlecode.kevinarpe.papaya.argument.DateTimeArgs

@FullyTested
public final class DateTimeArgs
extends Object

Static methods to check DateTime arguments.

See ObjectArgs for an overview.

Author:
Kevin Connor ARPE (kevinarpe@gmail.com)
